title: 錯置現象 The Displacement

sub_contents.text:
當樂器散落在整個空間中，表演者在場地中心操控，觀眾在被聲音和燈光包覆的空間中自由游移，體驗不同以忘的陌生感受—樂器空間化，處理音場、空間與燈光之間的關係，再加入電子聲響、電腦作曲、計算、控制音場，與真實樂器連結，創造更多聽覺視覺上的複雜度。

When the instruments and installations are placed around the space, and the performers are located at the center, controlling the installations. Audiences are hanging freely in the space surrounding by sound and light, experiencing an unusual and inexperienced perception. The instruments are as the space itself. By computing and controlling the sound 􀏐ield, and the relationship between space and light, joining electrical sounds, computational compositions, connecting with the real instruments, we try to create a variety and complexity in visual and in audio.
